Title: In the Wrong Hands
Description:
Look... um... this is really embarrassing. I set down my sword for like ONE SECOND to gather some orbs, and a big sprite sprung out of nowhere, snatched it, and bounded off down the western gap.

I can't go back to camp without it. Losing your weapon is a sure way to get kicked out of the Shado-Pan. It's sacred.

Please, can you try to find this big sprite and get my sword back? It would mean a lot to me.
CompletionText: My mom warned me this was going to happen...
RewardText:
You... you are a lifesaver! Seriously.

Thank you so much!
